title: The schema for the CIBA request response object (OIDC/FAPI compliant)

auth_req_id.description: This is a unique identifier for the authentication request made by the CIBA Client (third party)

expires_in.description: A positive integer value in seconds, indicating the expiration time since the authentication request was received

interval.description: The number of seconds a client MUST wait between polling requests to the token endpoint
